data.name: Deep Alchemy Dungeon
data.detailed_description:
Is that possible that an average witch can survive in a dungeon? Hmmm. But decent one has a chance.

DAD (Deep Alchemy Dungeon) is a third-person role-playing game in which you will be exploring an unfriendly dungeon in a classic medieval setting.

Of course, different kinds of weapons and ammunition will be available to the hero, but your primary weapon will be your alchemy proficiency.

Collect ingredients and utilize them efficiently. The game contains dozens of different potions with various effects. You'll have to carefully consider your choices, considering the side effects and the way you want the potion to perform.

Potions can be consumed, thrown at enemies, poured onto objects. Or you can spill them in a puddle and stare at your reflection. And not all mixtures work as common sense would suggest.

In any dungeon, there are always many hiding places and secrets concealed. There is no easy way to find all of them, but your magical liquids can provide solutions. With their help you can illuminate dark corners, enhance your senses to catch rustling behind a secret wall. But let's not reveal all the clues, though.

Depending on the quality, potions can produce side effects, and that could be a hindrance, but such is the reality. However, sometimes these side effects are even beneficial.

And of course no potion will help the hero to change her past. So, what about the future? That's a question

P.S.

Good news is that you may use each potion several times:


You need to be smart managing your ingredients and quality of your job. Each potion craft process is a challenge and quality of potion depends on how many mistakes you did:

data.short_description: D.A.D. is a dungeon crawling game where alchemy skills play a crucial role. Get ready to go through a deep dungeon full of traps, puzzles, secret rooms, and all sorts of mystical creatures. Use the full potential of your potions, and who knows, maybe youâ€™ll be lucky to survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
